mapper.select: SELECT t1.name, t3.residenceDetailAddres AS address, t1.cardId, t1.cardPathFull, t2.addPersonId, COUNT(t1.id) AS peersNumber FROM cw_add_person_with t1 LEFT JOIN cw_add_person_detail t2 ON t1.addPersonDetId = t2.id LEFT JOIN cw_base_people t3 ON t1.cardId = t3.credentialNo WHERE t2.addPersonId = #{addPersonId} GROUP BY t1.cardId
SELECT t1.* FROM cw_add_person_with t1 LEFT JOIN cw_add_person_detail t2 ON t1.addPersonDetId = t2.id WHERE t2.addPersonId = #{addPersonId} AND t1.cardId =#{cardId}
